metadata.description: Game compatibility database for Steam games on Xiaomi Pad 6 using Box64
metadata.installation_guide:
# Installing Steam with Box64 on ArchLinux ARM

**WARNING: NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DAMAGE**

## Prerequisites
- ArchLinux ARM or compatible distro (postmarketOS will not work due to musl instead of glibc)
- GNOME desktop environment (may work with others)

## Installation Steps

### 1. Install Box64
```
sudo pacman -S box64
```

### 2. Download Steam
Download steam.deb from the Steam website

### 3. Install required tools
```
sudo pacman -S binutils tar
```

### 4. Extract Steam package
```
cd ~/Downloads
ar x steam.deb
tar -xvf data.tar.xz
```

### 5. Install Steam files
```
sudo cp -r ./usr/* /usr/
sudo cp -r ./etc/* /etc/
sudo cp -r ./lib/* /lib/
```

### 6. Reboot system

### 7. Launch Steam
```
STEAMOS=1 STEAM_RUNTIME=1 DBUS_FATAL_WARNINGS=0 steam
```

### 8. Optional performance flag for some games
```
STEAMOS=1 STEAM_RUNTIME=1 DBUS_FATAL_WARNINGS=0 LIBGL_ALWAYS_SOFTWARE=1 steam
```

games.title: Terraria
games.notes:
Requires configuration:

1. Go to game Properties in Steam
2. Click on Compatibility
3. Enable compatibility mode
4. Select 'Legacy Runtime' instead of 'Steam Linux Runtime 1.0 (scout)'
5. Launch the game

games.title: Hollow Knight
games.notes:
Works better with additional launch flag:

1. Launch Steam with the command:
   `STEAMOS=1 STEAM_RUNTIME=1 DBUS_FATAL_WARNINGS=0 LIBGL_ALWAYS_SOFTWARE=1 steam`
2. Then launch the game normally

games.title: DDNet
games.notes:
Requires configuration:

1. Go to game Properties in Steam
2. Click on Compatibility
3. Enable compatibility mode
4. Select 'Proton 10.0-2 (Beta)'
5. When launching, select 'Play with OpenGL (if game doesn't start)'

games.title: R.E.P.O.
games.notes:
Requires configuration:

1. Launch Steam with:
   `STEAMOS=1 STEAM_RUNTIME=1 DBUS_FATAL_WARNINGS=0 LIBGL_ALWAYS_SOFTWARE=1 steam`
2. Go to game Properties
3. Set launch options to: `-force-gfx-direct`
4. Enable compatibility mode
5. Select 'Proton 9.0-4'
6. Launch the game

games.title: FNAF World
games.notes:
Requires configuration:

1. Go to game Properties
2. Set launch options to: `PROTON_NO_ESYNC=1 PROTON_USE_WINED3D=1 %command% -force-opengl -windowed`
3. Enable compatibility mode
4. Select 'Proton 10.0-2 (Beta)'
5. Launch the game
